What is Vertex?

Vertex is a TPS-FPS multiplayer session game in a grim sci-fi world.

Heavily inspired by «Jedi Knight» series, it offers a unique, deep, and responsive combat system.

Features

Allowing the players to engage in different stances and moves while having the freedom to perform acrobatics and certain powers against other players.

Featuring ranged and melee combat, Vertex aims to give freedom to players while retaining quality presentation and gameplay.

Set in a sci-fi timeline and featuring two distinct factions, players will be able to choose and customize their avatar in the game.

But above all, Vertex will feature modding support, enabling the players to form a community and create content they would like to see.
